Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Manchester in 1972...
Injured on 8/6/1975 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1977, off Nick Saez (SHP)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1977, off Florencio Lopez (NJ)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/4/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $700,000 per year...
